channel.title: Bonus Counter Questions
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Bonus Counter Questions" - A little more confusion.

item.title: Re: Bonus Counter Questions
item.content:encoded: I guess what we are all saying is that everything should be fine for thursday :)

item.title: Re: Bonus Counter Questions
item.content:encoded: And Thursday? I pick the best day to get my bonus Stamnia >_<

item.title: Re: Bonus Counter Questions
item.content:encoded:
Maintenance is normally only about 15-30 min at 2am-ish EST/EDT, durring that time all you can see is your main page, and you cannot do missions or visit your village. The warning is during that time because you may lose bonuses that you try for because the database in the backend is being updated. The reason you saw it today was because the Dayroll bugged, and got 'stuck'. So you really shouldn't need to worry about it at all!

To further clarify, Maintenance happens every day, so no it does not interfere with your bonus counter at all :D

item.title: Re: Bonus Counter Questions
item.content:encoded: I think he was talking about today when it said do not use bonuses or items, they may not countâ€¦..but no I don't think maintenance interferes.

item.title: Re: Bonus Counter Questions
item.content:encoded:
What do you mean "When it says not to"?

Maintenance doesn't interfere with your bonus counter.

item.title: Bonus Counter Questions
item.content:encoded:
If you use the bonus when it says not to and it doesn't work do they let you use it later in the day or no.
and Secondly I've got 19 days and 2 more days give me my ultra bonus. Does maintenace interfere?
